item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
Cry wolf all you want, it won’t save you. The Noxian warlord joins the Rift tomorrow! And hang tight for a skin straight from the screens on November 23rd!
🐺 Ambessa 🐺 Arcane Iron Will Ambessa
